channel.title: Bath on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Bath on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Bath & Body Works Logo Bath & Body Works, LLC. is an American retailer under the L Brands umbrella, along with Victoria’s Secret. It was founded in 1990 in New Albany, Ohio and has since expanded across 6 continents. In 1997, it was the largest bath shop chain in the United States of America. It specializes in shower gels, lotions, fragrance mists, perfumes, creams, candles, and home fragrances. Source
You can download theBath Body Workslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Bath Body Works
item.description: Bath & Body Works, LLC. is an American retailer under the L Brands umbrella, along with Victoria’s Secret. It was founded in 1990 in New Albany, Ohio and has since expanded across 6 continents. In 1997, it was the largest bath shop chain in the United States of America. It specializes in shower gels, lotions, fragrance mists, perfumes, creams, candles, and home fragrances. Source
